fullText: The Disney musical Aladdin is a genial crowd-pleaser that should keep audiences happy for years to come, even if it doesn't break new ground in musical theater artistry.
dtliExcerpt: The Disney musical Aladdin is a genial crowd-pleaser that should keep audiences happy for years to come, even if it doesn't break new ground in musical theater artistry.

showScoreExcerpt: Despite its flaws, Aladdin is an entertaining evening of theater that should please both children and adults looking for a fun night out.
